title: Friday Roundup: WBR Pedal to Empower, Bike League BIPOC, Win Campy Bora Ultra WTO wheels & more!
content:
World Bicycle Relief is back to Pedal to Empower – In its 16th year of providing life-altering bicycles to people in developing regions around the world, giving them access to education, healthcare & livelihoods, World Bicycle Relief is holding its 2nd annual Pedal to Empower global activation campaign. On June 5, 2021 WBR aims to […]

author: Cory Benson
